title: The Punisher Meets Archie (1994, One-Shot)
description: Yes, this actually happened. And it was...glorious. This one shot special tells the tale of when Archie met the Punisher (or the other way around, depending on which cover you own). It started as a joke but actually developed into a real crossover that's well-written, funny and with excellent art as well. Jointly published by both Marvel and Archie Comics in 1994. All credit to the original scanners as always. I would have had a picture of the Archie cover as well but bayimg is down right now for some reason. Ah well, seriously enjoy this one...and please seed, thanks! :-)
